thinking: The next step is to access settings. The account button is visible with index 0. Clicking on it should lead to settings.
The previous click on the account button didn't work. I'll try clicking on it again, using the different account label found on the screen with index 1.
I need to access settings to disable location sharing. The 'Settings' button (index 1) should take me there.
Based on the available options, 'Data Protection' seems like the most relevant section to find location sharing settings. Clicking on it to proceed further.
Seeing the page, there are two options related to sharing data. I should turn off both to limit location sharing.
Now I need to turn off allowing usage analytics to prevent location sharing as much as possible.
Since both third-party data sharing and usage analytics are now disabled, which are the only relevant location sharing related options available, the task is complete. Calling done.
